actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-1398.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide additional funds for the ad hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf for the expenses associated with the completion of the legislative process on H.R. 6218, a bill to establish a policy for the management of oil and natural gas in the Outer Continental Shelf, to amend the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act.

summary.text: Authorizes up to $89,000 be paid from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives for the additional expense of the House ad hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf associated with the completion of the legislative process on H.R. 6218; a bill to establish a policy for the management of oil and natural gas in the Outer Continental Shelf, to protect the marine and coastal environment, and to amend the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act. Directs that no more than $18,000 of such amount shall be used to procure the services of consultants.

titles.title: A resolution to provide additional funds for the ad hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf for the expenses associated with the completion of the legislative process on H.R. 6218, a bill to establish a policy for the management of oil and natural gas in the Outer Continental Shelf, to amend the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act.
